comments.body: Unfortunately they don't seem to include a license file. Please see issue ( https://github.com/euske/pdfminer/issues/142 ) for a request to add this. We will have to address this once they provide one to add.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@about:
  home: http://euske.github.io/pdfminer/index.html
  license: MIT
  summary: 'PDF parser and analyzer'
